thread.title: Soulja Boy Charged With Felony Gun Possession
thread.title_full: Soulja Boy Charged With Felony Gun Possession

author: Victoria Hernandez
title: Soulja Boy Charged With Felony Gun Possession
text:
Soulja Boy Charged With Felony Gun Possession January 23, 2017 | 1:22 PM 5 
Los Angeles, CA – Soulja Boy has more to fight than Chris Brown as he has been slapped with two felony charges for gun possession, TMZ reports. 
The charges — possession of an assault weapon and being a felon in possession of a firearm — come after Soulja’s December arrest where he was taken into custody for guns found in his home. After initial reports said he was cleared of charges, the “Crank That” rapper was also charged with a misdemeanor for stolen property because one of the guns was allegedly stolen from a police car. 
The assault weapons charge was for a mini Draco AR-15, which is illegal in the state of California. Soulja Boy rapped about threatening Quavo with a Draco before his arrest, and is apparently naming his upcoming album after the weapon. A photo posted by Soulja Boy • SODMG Records (@souljaboy) on Jan 18, 2017 at 8:02am PST 
He reportedly violated his probation stemming from a 2014 weapons possession case and if convicted, is facing four years in prison. 
HipHopDX has reached out to Soulja’s rep for comment on the reported charges.
